additionalAbilities.name: Nimble Escape
additionalAbilities.description: Orc-veteran can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

additionalAbilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
additionalAbilities.description: Orc-veteran deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Orc-veteran that isn't incapacitated and Orc-veteran doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

additionalAbilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
additionalAbilities.description: While in sunlight, Orc-veteran has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage in melee, or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
